name: Mobile Ecommerce UI Kit
description:
Mobile Ecommerce UI Kit, created with components and variants.


The project is a conceptual design for a fashion marketplace. It has been created with the atomic methodology in mind.


Important. In order to use the responsive components made with auto layout, it's necessary to use the same font - HeyWow - or to replace it with any other font.


Includes

  • Mobile design
  • Responsive UI Components created with Variants
  • 150+ prototyped screens
  • Style guide


Note. I do not own or claim ownership of any of the images used for the products, logos, collections, etc. These are used for demonstration purposes only.


Unicons by Iconscout.
